attributes.action: Are you paying two amounts of road tax? That's what the Congestion Charges are.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should motorists be asked to pay 2 lots of road tax? This is illegal. Anyone travelling into London (or wherever else they want to put a charge) are being asked to pay to drive on to public roads that they are already paying for in their Road Tax. This affects everyone who lives in a large city, not just London.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/congestiontax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
